title: Mars was once a 'blue planet': Ancient river deltas point to vast ocean
description: Using images from cameras on Mars orbiters, an international research team has discovered structures on Mars that are very similar to classic river deltas on Earth. These are traces of rivers that have deposited their sediments into an ocean. This shows that Mars was a "blue planet" around 3 billion years ago.

title: Israeli archaeologists launch project to trace origins of ancient pottery
description: The project, launched by the Israel Antiquities Authority (IAA), aims to trace the origin of thousands of ceramic vessels even when the kilns where they were fired have long vanished.

title: Archaeology breakthrough as Anglo-Saxon burial site of 'national importance' unearthed
description: The site was discovered during excavations for the Sizewell C nuclear power station
